text: Cayla pineapple almond milk smoothie is
one of the best ways to work your way
through cold and flu season because it's
chock-full of vitamins super delicious
as well start by peeling one banana
really high in potassium
we love our bananas here just break it
up into smaller pieces add one cup of
kale you can also use spinach I
definitely try to stick for a dark leafy
green to get maximum nutrients pineapple
one of my favorite things to include in
a smoothie has a really nice tangy zesty
sweetness this recipe calls for half a
cup of pineapple and then 1/2 a cup of
pineapple juice I don't have any juice
so I'm going to use one whole cup fresh
pineapple and add half a cup of water
sort of a DIY pineapple juice now this
is my favorite part of the smoothie one
cup homemade almond milk we've made
almond milk here we love it the almond
milk adds a really nice rich creaminess
okay let's blend
looks divine nice and frothy gorgeous
color Cheers
hmm
this is a really delicious creamy way to
enjoy your grades
